content: *even a beginner can crochet this dramatic wrap that can be worn either as a stole or an open poncho lion brand * lion brand pattern # 997 skill level advanced beginner corrections applied nov 15 2008 size medium 1x chest 40 44 in \ 101 111 cm length 32 35 in \ 81 60 cm homespun® article #790 6 8 balls *shown in corinthian* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm gauge 5 stitches = 3 in 7 6 cm in half_double_crochet u s pieces back left front right front garment is worked horizontally in half_double_crochet u s neck opening is shaped to create a curve sew or slip_stitch shoulder seams work single_crochet and reverse single_crochet around all edges to finish see urban wrap #70678ad 1 for the v-neckline version see also urban wrap knit version 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/urban-wrap-70678ad 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/urban-wrap-knit
